mutants.code:
def calculate_max_values(n, line):
    count = n + 1
    value = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if line[i] == 'L':
            value += i
        if line[i] == 'R':
            value += count - i
    values = []
    l = 0
    r = n - 1
    while l < r:
        if line[l] == 'L':
            value -= l
            value += count - l
            values.append(value)
        if line[r] == 'R':
            value += r
            value -= count - r
            values.append(value)
        l += 1
        r -= 1
    values.extend([value for _ in range(n - len(values))])
    return values

    values.extend([value for _ in range(n - len(values))])
    return values

def calculate_max_values(n, line):
    count = n - 1
    value = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if line[i] == 'L':
            value += i
        if line[i] == 'R':
            value += count - i
    values = []
    l = 0
    r = n - 1
    while l < r:
        if line[l] == 'L':
            value -= l
            value += count - l
            values.append(value)
        if line[r] == 'R':
            value += r
            value -= count - r
            values.append(value)
        l += 1
        r -= 0
    values.extend([value for _ in range(n - len(values))])
    return values
